parameters:
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey there, Miss Segi. If there's anything in our stock that
can be of use to you, feel free to take it without
hesitation.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey there, Segi-san. It's rare to see you here, what brings
you in?
\N<Segi>No, it's just that... I was hoping to have a little chat.
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>A chat? With me? What about...?

\N<Segi>By the way... that guy, Fubii was it? How has he been doing
lately?

\N<Segi>No... He's been attending the same training academy as my
son, so I was just... a bit concerned.

\N<Segi>If I remember correctly, he had some circumstances and
recently moved to this town, right...?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Ah, that's right. As I've told you before, Fubii came to
this town relying on me, his distant relative.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>At the time, I didn't know, but it seems his purpose was to
join the military training association.
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>But what's this all about? You want to know about him?

\N<Segi>N-no, it's just that... Apparently, my son saw him training
at the academy...

\N<Segi>And he was so surprised by the talent he witnessed that he
thought it might be something to learn from... Did I bother
you...?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>I see, no, you're not bothering me at all. Indeed, that guy,
his attitude isn't praiseworthy, but he's exceptionally
smart and physically capable.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Well, it's not some grand secret, but there are a few things
that come to mind.
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>The guy... Fubii is an orphanage kid.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>But it's not like he's a complete orphan. Both his father
and mother are known. However, his father died of an
epidemic or something when he was a baby.
\N<Segi>How terrible... What happened to him after that...?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Of course, his remaining mother took care of him. But then,
not long after her husband died, she found another man and
ran off with him.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>And so he ended up in the orphanage. From what I've heard,
he didn't try to make any friends there.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Not only that, but he didn't open up to anyone, including
the teaching staff.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Must have been tough for him. That's why he trained himself.
Pushed himself to the limit. Probably aimed to make a name
for himself as a warrior or something.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Who knows, he doesn't talk about his own matters with
someone like me.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>But maybe it's something like this. To catch the eye of the
mother who ran away. To make her focus on him... you know.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>That's about it. I feel like there might have been something
else with him, but I can't remember any more than that.
Something about an incident or whatever...

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Yeah, but sorry, I really can't remember. Well, it was
supposedly a fairly well-known incident, so maybe there's a
record of it somewhere.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>How about it? Is this good? Will it be helpful for Riia-
chan?

\N<Segi>Thank you very much. I think... my son will be happy to hear
this.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>That's good to hear. If there's anything else, feel free to
stop by anytime.
DW_目標設定 フービィの過去の記録を探す

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey there, Miss Segi. If there's anything in our stock that
can be of use to you, feel free to take it without
hesitation.
